text: "Beth" is a 1976 song by American rock band Kiss. It was taken from their fourth studio album Destroyer and went to number 7 in the United States, number 79 in Australia and number 5 in Canada. It did not chart in the United Kingdom and New Zealand. It is the B-side to their hit single Detroit Rock City. ==References== Category:1976 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Kiss (band) songs Category:Soft rock songs
title: Beth (song)
